title: Is using SkinPreview bannable?
body:
I saw a few youtube videos of people using it to showcase skins

was just wondering

replies.body: We aren't currently providing support for any third party programs, and using them would be at your own risk.  We can't provide any technical support if it messes up your game files, and we cannot be certain of any harmful content it could have hidden.  Our stance on this can be found through this [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848).  I know you may be interested due to skin showcases, but I highly recommend caution!
Ah, alright. Not sure if i'm willing to risk my account just see a skin, it'd be a shame to lose it due to something stupid like that.
